ClientToken.description: Unique, case-sensitive identifier you provide to ensure the idempotency of the request. For more information, see How to Ensure Idempotency.

DeliverLogsPermissionArn.description: The ARN for the IAM role that's used to post flow logs to a CloudWatch Logs log group.

LogGroupName.description: The name of the CloudWatch log group.

ResourceIds.description: One or more subnet, network interface, or VPC IDs. Constraints: Maximum of 1000 resources

ResourceType.description: The type of resource on which to create the flow log.

TrafficType.description: The type of traffic to log.
